author: P V
text:
Three persons, including the headmaster of Kallavi Government Higher Secondary School and two Parent Teacher Association (PTA) members, were booked for the suicide of an 18-year-old student here.

Prashanth, a Plus-One student had consumed poison early this month on the school premises, after he was given transfer certificate for misbehaviour. According to police, Prashanth was pursuing a classmate of his, and despite being turned down by the girl, he had continued to stalk her outside the school. The girl had complained to her mother, who later took it up with the headmaster.

On February 2, the boy had met the headmaster and asked to be allowed to rejoin the school. The headmaster had asked him to bring his parents Prashanth later went to the school terrace and consumed rat poison. On Saturday, his condition worsened with jaundice and he succumbed at a private hospital in Krishnagiri.
title: Boy who consumed poison in school dies
